    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bond
    Represents a bond instrument.
    BondMarketValueCalculator
    Calculator for bond market values.
    Equity
    Represents an equity instrument like stocks or shares.
    EquityMarketValueCalculator
    Calculator for equity market values.
    FinancialInstrument
    Abstract base class for all financial instruments.
    Future
    Represents a futures contract.
    FutureMarketValueCalculator
    Calculator for futures market values.
    FXForward
    Represents an FX Forward contract.
    FXForwardMarketValueCalculator
    Calculator for FX Forward market values.
    MarketValueCalculator<T>
    Interface for calculating market values of financial instruments.
    MarketValueCalculatorFactory
    Factory class that provides a unified interface for market value calculations for different types of financial instruments.
